what: pkgrpArmy: Package for Army Shiny App - Group E Programming Tools in Data Science — pkgrpArmy-package
title: pkgrpArmy: Package for Army Shiny App - Group E Programming Tools in Data Science — pkgrpArmy-package
text: PACKAGE: package recall two main function. first one, 'Convert', return graph create list points. second one,'Orientation', correlated first one create data-frame listing weapons class based sum point list created . Additionally package contains data-sets used loaded directly functions mentioned cand loaded directly user. first data-set, 'points_army' data-set data frame 26 rows 6 columns contianing several results 5 type exercises point gained obtaining resultb category. Example: result 2.80 2.85 jumping give 24 points. 'Performances' data-set, data frame 19 rows 2 columns, minimum points needd reach specific weapon class. Example: completing exercises sum results 50, means can enter army class equals requirement points, case correspond "Driver". SHINY: package also recall shiny app regarding "Performance Scoreboard Recruitment" 'militaryapp()' function. app built group E inserting result phisical exercises, give possible weapon class belonging. app entirely English video French regarding exercises .
